captions: Newscaster is reporting on a One Direction band member.
Harry Styles is seen outside wearing a white shirt.
The word "Style" appears on the screen.
A blonde woman is shown.
A woman wearing a helmet and safety gear rappels down a steep rock face.
A man wearing a helmet and safety gear rappels down a steep rock face.
A woman wearing a helmet and safety gear rappels down a steep rock face.
A woman who has just finished rock climbing is greeted by a friend.
A man is being lowered down from a cliff as he is suspended by a roped harness.
The man continues to descend, upside down, as he nears the bottom of the cliff.
Now right-side up, the man reaches the bottom of the cliff and prepares to land.
The man lands on the ground, uninjured, and takes a moment to rest.
A person with climbing gear is climbing down the cliff.
A young woman wearing a black helmet repels off of a bridge toward rocks below while people talk in the background.
A person repelling down the side of a concrete bridge.
A person repels off a bridge down toward the rocks below.
Two men, wearing safety gear, rappel down a steep cliff.
One man holds the rope while another rappels down.
A man ties a safety rope around his waist.
Two men rappel down a cliff face, over a river.
Baby Roderick is puzzled as his glasses keep getting moved.
Adjusting the plastic-framed glasses on her face, she ponders, "Are these the right ones?"
A woman squints as she attempts to read an eye chart.
A woman puts on a pair of glasses and covers one eye.
The woman adjusts the glasses to make the eye chart clearer.
The eye chart is now clear, and the woman can read it easily.
The man in the driver's seat is air drumming to the music.
The blonde woman in the passenger's seat watches him.
The man looks over at the camera and smiles.
Guy sitting in a chair and rocking out to some music.
The guy is really getting into the music, headbanging and all.
He's lost in the music, completely in his own world.
The guy is totally feeling the beat, rocking out on the drums.
